name: Akuma No Boken
description:
Description:

In a kingdom away from evil, people enjoy peace, all this was possible until the demons took control of the enchanted forest. Become our protagonist "Fhosty" a royal postman in the service of king who has the mission of informing and kill them, help him defeat all the demons and expel them from the forest.

              

How to play:

Controls:

D  to mover right

A to move left

W to move up

S to move down

Authors an Licenses:

This game was made by the members of the group Createvia:

  • Néstor Salinas García
  • Rodrigo Pelegrin Salar
  • Óscar González Martínez

To make this game we used the following software:

  • Tiled: To create maps.
  • CPCTelera: An integrated development framework for creating Amstrad CPC games
  • Visual Studio Code:  Code editor.
  • GIMP: Image design.
  • Aseprite: Sprites design.
  • Arkos Tracker I: Music for the game.

Install Intructions:

You can play this game on a real amstrad cpc machine or also on emulators such as RetroVirtualMachine and WinAPE for game quality.

Gestures:

We have reference to the game Larcena's Legacy, you can see this in the character's lifes that are letthers withs hearts to simulate the lifes of our royal postman.
